title: Episode 37: Trader Joe's Spices Up Your Shopping List
itunes:title: Trader Joe's Spices Up Your Shopping List
description:
Are you Team Spices or Team Spicy? On this episode of Inside Trader Joe’s, we make the case that you can serve both squads, with delicious results. A heated conversation with our resident seasoning alchemist (aka Spices Category Manager) reveals an abundance of seasonings from savory to spicy; and we challenge a Crew Member’s palate with Trader Joe’s products spanning the spicy spectrum.   

 

Transcript (PDF)
